name: LD46 - Long Live The King
description:
STORY

Hear ye Hear ye,

Let it be known that the King of the land has perished in his sleep. Word came to the throne of a bastard son, who shall rename unnamed from this day forth. The King’s brother shall usurp the throne and has declared he will reign with iron hand. If the King’s son, rightful heir to the throne, does not reach the castle alive, this shall be seen as a decree in which the prince relinquishes his right and bloodline…

His mother, the Lady, has instructed you to move the Prince to the throne, avoiding the Royal guards who have been instructed to stop you.

Move at night… Move bravely, but most of all …

KEEP THE PRINCE ALIVE…

GAMEPLAY

Run from one safehouse to the next, defeating all royal guards that are trying to take the baby prince. Be careful, once you drop the baby you will not have much time to pick him back up… All guards need to be defeated in order to enter the next safe house.

CONTROLS

The control scheme for Long Live The King is extremely simple. You press [F] to wield your staff, use the arrow keys to run around and press the [DOWN] key to pick up the baby in case it was dropped.

Long Live The King is an endless beat em up game developed during Ludum Dare 46, as a Compo submission. This entails that all assets (including audio) and codebase were developed within a timespan of 48 hours.
